charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1101_0200_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] walked around
town, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard some playful laughter.
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_0400_:
Are you out on a walk? The weather’s nice and
pleasant today, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_0500_: I think Eevee’s saying hi to you, too.
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0402_0900_: Eevee seems to be enjoying the weather, too!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_1000_:
I’m glad you got to chat with
[Name:PlayerNickname ], partner!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0301_1100_: You two sure get along well!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0401_1200_:
Yep! I’m confident that our friendship is stronger
than anyone else’s!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_1500_:
Eevee and I started our adventure together from
Pallet Town.
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_1600_:
She did an amazing job in Pokémon battles,
and also helped a ton while we explored!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_1700_:
Thanks to Eevee, I was able to travel to all sorts
of places in Kanto!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_1800_:
We explored forests, caves, and the ocean...
Oh, and we traveled up in the sky, too!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0401_2000_:
Yep! Eevee and I traveled the ocean together on
a surfboard!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0402_2200_:
Yep! We’d get on a vehicle with balloons attached
to it, and fly up in the sky together!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_2300_:
My Eevee can actually use something called
Secret Techniques.
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_2400_:
Thanks to that, we were able to explore the ocean
and even the sky together! Isn’t that amazing?
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_2500_:
Secret Techniques are usually only used
by humans.
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_2600_:
But for some reason, my Eevee can use them.
Strange, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_2700_: Come to think of it, on the day we first met...
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_2800_:
she’d do things like move around in her Poké Ball.
I could tell she was a little different from
the others.
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_2900_:
But that makes me even more grateful to have met
my partner, Eevee—from the bottom of my heart!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_3000_:
Do you have a unique friend like Eevee,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0401_3200_: Really? Please introduce them to me some time!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0302_3300_: I think all my friends are unique.
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_0402_3400_:
I’m sure they were the ones that helped you during
your adventures, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_3500_:
People or Pokémon, everyone is unique in their
own way!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_3600_:
That’s why I’m super excited to see what kind of
Pokémon and people I’ll meet on my path ahead!
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_3800_:
Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ], would you like to
take a walk together?
charaepi_ch0269_00_ayumi/2301_1201_3900_: Now that we’re all here, let’s go!
